scenario.name: register_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];[$params]> Allow: INVITE, CANCEL, BYE, ACK, REGISTER, OPTIONS, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, INFO, PRACK, UPDATE Allow-Events: talk,hold Expires: 3600 User-Agent: SIPp Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];[$params]> [authentication] Allow: INVITE, CANCEL, BYE, ACK, REGISTER, OPTIONS, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, INFO, PRACK, UPDATE Allow-Events: talk,hold Expires: 3600 User-Agent: SIPp Content-Length: 0
